Great game to be competative whether youre solo or with friends. Helps imporve your aim for all fps games you play in my opinion and overall just a joy to play. no matter how good or bad i play (and i dont play well often), i always come back wanting more!

Very fun game mainly for its competitive scene. This game is great for something to be satisfied by your progression in it with ranks and with every kill. This game is most fun with friend's who put the same amount of effort in as well as having a addicting skin marketplace. Not pay to win luckily
Super competitive game. Lots of fun if you are winning. Losing is never fun

Tirando o mundo de hack no free, e os toxicos do prime o jogo eh mt bom :D
Jogo perfeito sem erros, é muito bom

1171 hours into this game, 
You might be asking yourself, Was it worth it. 
Well it started back in 2016 when i first got my AlienWare laptop, which tbh was a pretty good laptop, However the game wasn't. i would go into games, and have very toxic team mates. Be put into lobbies with people that had very high ranks and i would get dominated, physically and mentally.
Fast forward 1 year, i buy a Csgo Butterfly knife, which i was so very proud of cause i saved a lot of money to buy it as i was just 16. And guess what i got hacked <3 oh how i love this game. 
Lets fast forward another year. and this is when i stopped playing as every lobby contained hackers, which made me doubt myself as i couldn't achieve my goal, which was to get out of silver.
Now to where i am 2019 and depressed as always, Hackers in lobbies, Scammers messaging me on a daily basis for my skins, Toxic team mates and finally getting Csgo'd.
BUT everyone always asks me would you recommend this game and i'll always say well. 
YEs as it is CSGO and we love this game and this community<3 
Love by xavier to Mr Csgo ppl
Very cool, very swag. i like it!
Great game! But please please please redo the ranking system. It absolutely sucks!
